author: Chad Pearson
comment: The only thing I would change would be.... Every 10 pizzas get a free large not every 6 times you use the app for a medium that's like a free medium every 24 pizzas. I don't order a lot of pizza, but when I do I usually order two at a time I think this type of Kickback for app users only would benefit tremendously I know the developer doesn't work exclusively with Domino's but it would be nice to at least get a recommendation for this change to them. Thank you for your time. You have a wonderful day! Chad

My favorite online/mobile pizza ordering app. Easy to use, love the delivery ETA / countdown after order is submitted. Only issue is that the "Special Instructions" section doesn't let you type more than a few words. My house is difficult to find so I wish I could type more for the delivery driver to see.

author: Whitney Hogue
comment: This app let's you look for active coupons and shows you what on the menu you can use the coupons on, super convenient if you don't want to look for a coupon code. And if you make an account you can get points for a free medium pizza! It's pretty awesome. The app even tells you what is happening at the shop so you know when to go pick it up

author: Alyson Pago
comment: It's easy to use. The only complaints I have are that the codes for the local school fundraiser does not work when applied on the nights of the fundraiser (about once a month) so I have to call in and am not able to get my points on the app, and I get a message on my phone saying that the app has stopped when I'm not even using the app. I have to force stop the app when this happens or the message will continue popping up every hour or so if I don't.

author: Steven Habermehl
comment: 2+ years later, still no in app tipping!!! ;( Now beyond ridiculous! Works fantastic and would be 5 star when I can tip on the app. Makes no sense not to have that feature. More convenient for the customer, safer for the driver. Whats the problem??

author: Joel Wadagnlo
comment: The app is responsive and doesn't feel clunky.  The layout is intuitive which makes for quick and easy navigation.   The ability to reorder a saved selection is great especially since you can just start with it and modify it from there if you want anything different, and it saves whatever coupon you were using. The pizza tracker is extremely useful (even if it feels like a timer that automatically transitions between states without someone actually triggering it manually), particularly for when it tells you when the driver left the store with your pizza, you can get the feel for how long it should take. The only change I would recommend would be a map which shows the driver's general location to get an even better idea of when they will be arriving, which us great if you don't plan to be hanging around within earshot of your front door (e.g. upstairs/downstairs or outside).

author: Little Bobby
comment: Horrible company. I will never give them my business again. My order took 3x longer to make than they said. They didn't even tell me my order was ready once it was ready, so everything is cold.

author: Matthew Cabrigas
comment: App is fine, but it doesn't match what the store has in stock. FOR EXAMPLE, if I order soda (Coke products), I get a Pepsi equivalent. First world problem, but there's a difference! That's just false advertising...

author: Robert Trimble
comment: Very easy to use interface with multiple locations to order to or from. A default setting for home and save other locations.  I have had to take one star back as this app is no longer being improved. There should be a space to write a note to the store. My servicing location has promised me so many times, "oh, sorry about that, we'll send you another one with your next order, but I never do, and I'm unable to ask them through the app. Thank you!

author: Jeff Mathews
comment: This app has been phenomenal, especially since I saved my easy order. Can open it up and have my order placed under a minute. The reward points for free pizza are killer as well. Only complaint would be that sometimes the coupon offers contradict each other (like the same offer for 2 different prices), but thats more with hq rather than the app. Stellar overall.

author: Big Papa
comment: Upon downloading this app, I haven't been disappointed, after months of inactivity, Dominos still remembers my previous orders for easy access to reorder it again. The app itself isn't the problem with my issues though, atleast I don't think. Very rarely my order is wrong, such as a missing item, but regardless I haven't lost a penny to these errors, just small inconveniences. 👍

author: Nirav Surati
comment: Updated review: app now works as normal. No longer hangs up on pay screen. Still makes me start over again if I press the home button middle of the order. App doesn't properly suspend.

author: Carter Eagleston
comment: Intuitive and easy to use. The 7.99 large 3 topping carryout only every day special (look under "coupons" section) is hard to beat, especially when you have a Domino's right around the corner... Shame on me. Shame... ;) I am however hoping that having rated the app finally, that it will stop annoying me asking me to do so every time I order. That bit is annoying.

author: Jessie Zahn
comment: Its great unless you want to redeem your free pizza earned through rewards. I was not able to redeem my free pizza and have additional items. It kept changing my free pizza to charging me for it. It is rare i will get just a medium pizza because i have 3 kids.

author: Gray
comment: Coupons available depend on which store you use...coupons should be the same for all stores.  Domino's customer service NEVER responds to emails.

author: G M
comment: Easy to use,  needs a little more flexibility on choosing custom items.  I have had problems with my credit card the two times I've tried, the card doesn't go through but I get charged, however the bank process the return automatically,  very wierd so I chose to pay cash.

author: Shell Lynn
comment: Easy to guide through app, although you cant order more than $25 w/o putting it on credit card... couldn't add extras bit frustrating

author: Joe
comment: Update delivery locations on app. I live1/2 mile away, yet app says I'm too far away! If I call in my order they will deliver. So, fix the f***n app!
It's an easy way to order. Have only had a few mishaps with receiving the wrong items or things being forgotten

author: Eric Standon
comment: For a long time now I've been trying to wrap my brain around the fact at every days end, when that very divine time for dinner comes.... And ends.... Im left with this beast and this beast doesn't tame easily... Since my first day walking and my last day, there was but one.. that could save me.. that HAS saved me!! saved me by helping me fend off the beast... Dominoes!! You've been by my side since my first breath and til my last! We will tame and conquer this beast in my stomach called HUNGER for eternity!

author: Dave Elvir
comment: Love it! It does tend to crash every now and then but that doesn't change the outcome. I just press a few buttons and head out to get my pizza!

author: Jeremy Stevens
comment: You need to be able to add tips to credit card purchases for thr driver's. I rarely keep cash on me leaving this off the app is wrong.

author: Laura Karstens
comment: App works great, until you have something in the cart and background the app. When you come back, it reloads to the home screen, where there is no visibility to the cart or it is reset and have to start the whole process over again.

author: Michael Burlile
comment: No longer giving this app a high rating.   I have had to cancel or modify my order because a store can't provide service.  Dominos need to up their game in store.  STAFF YOUR STORES!! Or fix your app!   If you can't deliver for 2 hours, the app should reflect that!  Feed back from the individual store, that way I'm not waiting for 30 min, watching the app progress through the steps, only to receive a phone call telling me my pizza did not get made, as the app showed, and would be a least another hour before I would get my order delievered.

author: Tandra Kidman Kidman
comment: Fast and easy!! Especially when you're starving lol. All except for them Not accepting credit cards over a certain amount and when u call them they are totally clueless as to what u are referring to and u have to make another order and get charged a dbl delivery fee. Smh also their items have gotten smaller such as their pasta bowls and you can no longer request extra sauce on it. However the cinnamon twists are a definite win too bad bad you only get 8 lol.

author: Andrew Jersey
comment: Love the tracker. Easy to use! The voice ordering thing is not very useful however, just ignore that feature and this is a great app. Dominos is also good about fixing issues with your order.

author: Jaira Hamilton
comment: Easy way to order! Hate that when you leave the tracker after a while it disappears and along with the review for the staff..
Easy to use and navigate, I love that it saves an easy order or frequent order. Downside is if app gets closed, you cannot easily get back to the pizza tracker.

author: Randizzle '
comment: For the past 6 months, haven't had a problem!  If we ordered sauce,  please put the sauce with the order 😁

author: Tara P
comment: Almost 3 years ago I said "Good to keep track of how long you have to wait" but that was an understated review.  It's a perfect little app for pizza ordering. Easy to use. Very clean layout. It has the ability to store locations and payment details; as well as,  gives you coupons and ability to earn towards free pizzas.  It's reliable and well integrated.

author: Enrique Grimaldo
comment: App doesn't give realistic delivery times. Placed an order and it says 23-33 minutes. 45 minutes later I called and was told delivery time is 2 and a half hours. They moved my order up but the app itself was pretty inconvenient. Had I known I would not have ordered.

author: Levi Ward
comment: Wow where do I start? Do i like being pampered like ancient kings of old? Do I enjoy feasting on delicacies that no mere peasants are capable of comprehending? Do I bask and bathe in the glory of all that is pizza? Yes. YES. YESSS! If i had only one food to shovel into my gullet for the rest of eternity it would be Dominos. If dominos were a person, i would totally kidnap them and force them into servitude to forever make me delicious affordable treats. And have you had the lava cakes? Jesus. Christ. I dont know what i wouldnt do for one of those chocolatey bastards. They are so good, if your not ready for it, it can very well drive you to crazy depression due to the fact you cant be the lava cake itself.

author: William Cikity
comment: How ever you want it you get it... And fast. You can see what you want and not have to ask the annoying questions.

author: Darrah Lynch
comment: Definitely a convenient app. I do like that they have coupons that apply, though even if you don't apply them the price is the same so is it REALLY a coupon? And EVERY TIME I order on the app and purchase additional sauces, they never bring them! If you are going to make people pay extra money for sauces, then it would be nice to actually receive them. I love their food, I've just had this complication with the app for over a year and maybe adding a way to leave notes/messages on orders in the app would would be helpful.

author: just me
comment: Can't order my Easy Order anymore. You can save an easy order but there is no way to reorder it. Also, can't see previous orders.

author: Tony Campos
comment: Can't beat the tracker and convenience of ordering! Never had any issues.

author: Rachel Byrd
comment: Upgrade listed nearest dominoes to me almost 10 minutes away. Wth there's one within walking distance to me. Not liking the new upgrade.

author: Jessy Dyer
comment: I LOVE pizza!!!! So whenever I'm at a friend's house and don't know a near pizza place I can just open up the app and my place my order. This app is so easy to use and I can always use coupons.. YAY!!!

author: John Remlinger
comment: Honestly, I can't say enough about this app and company in general. The apps navigation is extremely user-friendly and walks you though the order process step by step. It will also show you was of saving money with suggesting special offers you may not have been aware of. With it's online Order Tracker, you'll always know what the status of your order is and that, in itself, makes the waiting time feel like a breeze. GREAT IDEA Domino's!! .. overall I give this app the full 5 stars. And recommend it to anyone looking for a simple but extremely helpful way to order a pizza.

author: G Lewis
comment: Simple and easy to navigate. I dont know what the hell Pizza Hut is thinking with that bizarre app. Let's face it Papa John's is not an option in my house!
